bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of jing feng 驚風 , fright wind, characterised by a virid-black color covering the entire body. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry huang tu 黃土 : quotes XEMJ : 烏沙驚風，小兒 驚風遍身都烏者。急推向下，將黃土一碗，搗末，入久醋一鍾，炒熱包 定熨之，引下至足，刺破為妙 , “ Black sand fright wind: When children are black all over the body because of fright wind, this should quickly be pushed down. Take 1 bowl of yellow soil and grind to a powder. Add 1 cup of old vinegar, heat this and apply as compresses. This will pull it down into the feet. Pricking there to open is best”.
